WEB N+1
New uses for the enhanced platform.
1.
Evolution or timeline of the post/guide.
2.
Advanced and complex searches of content (also in posts).
3.
Trace the latest actions of a certain user.
4.
If the contents are uploaded from a mobile platform, the geolocalization can 
be used to follow the tour which a certain user is doing in his travel to 
somewhere (for example, showing his location in a minimap in his blog).
speaker: SYSTEM
